solidity.format.title: Solidity Formatter
solidity.format.bracketSpacing: Controls the printing of spaces inside object literals.
solidity.format.printWidth: Fit code within this line limit.
solidity.format.singleQuote: Use single instead of double quotes.
solidity.format.tabWidth: Number of spaces it should use per tab.
solidity.compile.title: Solidity Compiler
